features: Removable TSA Approved Toiletry Bag: This compact toiletry bags for traveling women with detachable quart size travel bag tsa approved, complies with TSA 3-1-1 airline rules and regulations, making it easy and fast to get through airport security. You can use this clear toiletry bags for traveling as a separate cosmetic bag or for everyday items like headphones, keys, and more

Several Compartments Travel Toiletry Bag: A zippered mesh pocket for toothbrush, toothpaste or small items. A large zipper bag, for daily toiletries such as shower gel, shampoo and facial cleanser. A detachable clear tsa approved toiletry bag for skin care or travel size toiletries

Premium Material: The tsa toiletry bag is made of high quality clear PVC material, which is waterproof, eco-friendly, easy to clean, durable and reusable. Zipper Close, keeps your toiletries organized and clean. (does not include vials)

Convenient and Durable Hanging Metal Hook: The hanging toiletry bag makes travel more convenient and portable,the durable metal hook let you to hang your bag by your side for quick access to items. A carrying strap is included to ensure easy carrying of your bag when traveling

Travel Essentials: Perfectly organize your travel kit when going to the gym, traveling, outdoors, weekend getaways, business trips or plane for fly. This toiletry bags for traveling is great travel gifts for women. Also travel must haves hanging dopp kit toiletry bag for men who needs to hold their bathroom kit, shaving kit. International travel must haves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐This hanging Toiletry Bag has become an absolute staple in my travels, and I can't imagine embarking on a trip without it. This 2-in-1 toiletry bag has not only simplified my packing routine but has also streamlined the security check process, making it an indispensable travel companion.First and foremost, the design of this toiletry bag is brilliant. The hanging feature allows me to access my essentials with ease, saving valuable counter space in cramped hotel bathrooms. The thoughtfully organized compartments ensure that everything has its place, from toiletries to cosmetics, making it easy to find what I need without rummaging through my belongings.The inclusion of a TSA-approved clear toiletry bag is a game-changer. It not only complies with airport security regulations but also makes the security screening process a breeze. The removable liquids bag is transparent, allowing a quick and hassle-free inspection while keeping my toiletries neatly organized.The durability of this toiletry bag is noteworthy. The high-quality materials and sturdy zippers give me confidence that it can withstand the rigors of travel. I appreciate the attention to detail in the construction, and the reinforced seams provide extra reassurance that my toiletries are secure.The compact and portable design is perfect for any type of travel – whether it's a weekend getaway or an extended vacation. The versatility and functionality of this toiletry bag make it a must-have for any traveler.In conclusion, the Hanging Toiletry Bag with TSA Approved Clear Toiletry Bag is a travel essential that has truly elevated my packing and organization game. It's a well-thought-out, practical, and durable solution that has earned its place as a staple in my travels. I wholeheartedly give it a five-star rating and highly recommend it to fellow travelers looking for convenience and efficiency in their toiletry organization.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, practical and great price
reviews.reviewText: I initially was looking for something for my plane travels. Something simple with a clear TSA size. And I found it. $10 and it has everything I needed. A detachable zipper for TSA pouch. A hook for small space like an economy restroom on any plane. I use this for my overnight hotel stay where their countertop space is less than practical. I use it for my female locker room / shower after a lap swim. It fits a ton. I had all my 3.5 oz bottles and tube just to test the bag. Oh my gosh. It is so well thought! Buy it if you don’t need a big bulky full size toilet bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the slim profile, great for weekend trip.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product in a size small and it’s great for a weekend trip or when you’re flying with a carryon or personal item, only. I like that it’s not too bulky and can fit my travel sized toiletries and the amount of make up needed for a casual trip. This won’t fit everything like a regular zip up travel case so if you are used to packing a hairbrush or tooth brush in your travel case this produce isn’t for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and easy to pack but functional
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband because I already had one for myself and I love it.I like the size of the different pockets, but really like the bottom pouch for liquids that can be unzipped and pulled out of my carry-on luggage for TSA inspection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thoughtfully designed and compact
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a 3 week trip to Europe and have used it for every small weekend trip since then. It has enough compartments to separate my makeup and contacts from my shampoo/soaps, hair products, deodorant, toothbrush/floss, etc. It’s easy to hang when you arrive at your destination and if liquids need to be separated out for TSA, the bottom compartment easily zips off (can also be made smaller that way for shorter trips and will still close). It looks super simple, but the design was SO THOUGHTFUL for someone who actually travels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wife hates it, I love it.
reviews.reviewText: These look cheap and tacky. My wife hates it. I love it. Because it's transparent, you don't lose time looking for various pockets, you know exactly where everything is, and you don't get any trouble at the security check. Easy to clean. Very light. Functionality rules! Don't know how sturdy it is, I have only had it for a couple of weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I love it BUT…..
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This makeup bag is perfect! But… the bag dis formed! I thought once it was out of the packaging and had all my makeup in it, it would be better. Unfortunately, it is not! Therefore it makes it really hard to zipper! :( The video is not the best, but it’s hard to video with one hand, you get the point!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice travel case, holds alot
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This a a really nice toiletry travel case. It was smaller than I expected BUT it holds alot! I was looking for something larger to fit my eyeshadow pallet, but it didn't. Also, full size hair products (shampoo etc) will not fit in these compartments. I should have checked the measurements before. I ended up taking it on vacation because I did not have time to look for something else. It worked out just fine, I carried my pallets and hair products in something else. One area can be unzipped and removed if you don't need it (see pic). The only negative I would say is it would be nice if the strap on the clasp had the ability to betightened, because if you do remove one compartment you cannot tighten the strap to secure and make it tighter. Hopefully that makes sense. Easy to clean. Another reviewer mentioned "black hairs" inside the bag. I saw those also, at first I also thought it was hair. But they were definitely not hairs. They are loose fibers/string from the black lining. I'm sure this was made cheaply and quickly in a assembly line in china (tag inside says made in China) where they did not take the time clean up the loose strings. See video review. Hope this helps.
Just as advertised, versatile and seems well made (not yet used) but plenty of storage options and folds to a compact size.
El artículo es bueno, aunque sus dimensiones son un poco más grandes de las esperadas.
